feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.2.0
entry.content:
• Added Low Usage Mode so gpu barley utilized for Huntarr

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.1.4...7.2.0

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.2.1
entry.content: • Restored reset cycle function from 7.1.4 (good catch https://github.com/scr4tchy @scr4tchy)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.2.2
entry.content:
• Provides subpath reverse proxy support - credit 100% @scr4tchy - issue (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/130)

What's Changed

  • Start fixing subpath support.. by @scr4tchy in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/497

New Contributors

  • @scr4tchy made their first contribution in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/497

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.2.1...7.2.2

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.3.0
entry.content:
• Count Down Timers Added per request (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/506)
  • Fixed User Page (for those with logins to navigate properly - glitch in 7.2.2)
  • Fixed Halo around WhisparrV3
  • Provided a pre-loader area for sponsorship in the middle so doesn't start with a weird gap

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

@scr4tchy fix for dynamic paths for count downs.

  • Fix 'dashboard' link in setup & countdown for subpath case by @scr4tchy in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/507 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.3.0...7.3.1
